subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Sean Avery scored a goal on a weird bounce off the glass in the first period, then sent a sharp pass across the crease to Brendan Shanahan for the winning goal with 4 minutes 1 second left.
snippet: Sean Avery scored a goal on a weird bounce off the glass in the first period, then sent a sharp pass across the crease to Brendan Shanahan for the winning goal with 4 minutes 1 second left.
